2144.subject: ED
2144.descrlong: Introduces multiple subject students to theory and practice for teaching science and health in general education classroom, grades K-8. Identifies appropriate methods and resources. Emphasizes achievement of science content standards by all students in the inclusionary classroom.  Includes four hours of coursework and two hours of fieldwork weekly for the first 10 weeks of an academic semester. (Offered spring semester and as interest warrants.)
